```markdown
# Persona: Finance Team Member

## Description
Manages giving records, tracks contributions, and generates financial reports, ensuring accurate accounting for the church.

## Responsibilities
- Record and reconcile giving transactions
- Generate and export financial statements and donation receipts
- Manage funds, allocations, and internal transfers
- Support audits and financial reviews
- Ensure compliance with tax and donation regulations

## Access / Permissions
- Access to financial/giving modules and export tools
- Can generate reports but not change audit logs
- Restricted access to PII and payment provider settings unless explicitly authorized

## Example Prompts
- "Export donation receipts for donor X for the tax year."
- "Reconcile batch deposits with bank statements for last Sunday."
- "Generate fund allocation report for the stewardship team."

## Edge Cases / Notes
- Sensitive financial actions should require dual-approval for large changes
- Keep careful records of refunds, chargebacks, and reversals

## Success Criteria
- Financial reports are accurate and auditable
- Reconciliation processes complete within expected SLAs
